text: Romeo: Doth she not love me? What is life without love? A life without love is surely not worth living. It is a life of hate, as good as death, worse than death. My only option is to die, to kill myself, for that is  better than to live in a world without love. My Juliet was the only thing worth living for, and now she is gone. (Draws sword) Goodbye world of hate! (Plunges sword into chest)
